text.text: Last chance to deposit fee for admission in fall 2020 session

text: Applicants whose Admission Application Forms were accepted for admission in their respective study program are informed to

text.text: deposit “Admission Fee Voucher” on or before Wednesday, November 18, 2020

text:
for the confirmation of their admissions.

No request will be entertained after November 18, 2020.

Lecture Slides

I have converted all the slides into PDF and them merged them into a single file.

text.text: Issuance of 1st Voucher to Continuing Students (Fall'2020 Semester)

text:
Students are informed that the University has issued first voucher (Semester Enrollment fee + One Course fee) for Fall, 2020 semester to continuing students, who have made course selection from November 09, 2020 to November 16, 2020. Furthermore, the University has already issued said fee voucher to those who made course selection prior to November 09, 2020.

You are directed to deposit payable voucher as per given schedule.

text.text: CS702 - Advanced Algorithms Analysis and Design
CS702 - Advanced Algorithms Analysis and Design
JFLAP 7.0 Simulator Tutorial for designing Turing Machines

text:
Please visit following tutorial link for using the JFLAP 7.0 Simulator. 

JFLAP is software for experimenting with formal languages topics including nondeterministic finite automata, Turing machines, and multi-tape Turing machines. 

In addition to constructing and testing examples for these, JFLAP allows one to experiment with construction proofs from one form to another. 

This tutorial will help design the Turing machine in upcoming your assignment task.

Weekly Online Interactive Sessions

text: We will have online interactive sessions every week through Skype on:

Skype id to join the session:
Please send a request to the above mentioned skype id. Enter your VU ID and name to join the session during the designated time.
